tossup_question: 8)BIOLOGY  What substance converts pepsinogen (read as: pep-SIN-oh-gen) into its active form in the human stomach?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: HCl (ACCEPT: HYDROCHLORIC ACID) (DO NOT ACCEPT: GASTRIC JUICES)
bonus_question: 9) BIOLOGY  Chlorosis in plants can be caused by a deficiency in which of the following nutrients?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Zinc
X) Phosphorous 
Y) Iron 
Z) Calcium
